name: uieSpriter

description.text: This component analyze the current page's css and let the user visualize all images used as background with all recurrances usage as colored rectangular objects.

options: A collection of properties for customize the layout and behavior of each slider.

properties.text: You can pass some (or all) of these properties within an object inside constructor.

extension: Css extension object for customizable element.
reference: Selector in which will search for element with background.
visible: Default visibility before and right after sprites are loaded.
domain: The accepted domain (will not load images outside this domain)
callback: Callback triggered when all sprites are loaded (after analyze).

analyze(): Analyze the current page's CSS and returns the uieSpriter itself.
css2file(css,trimExt): Extract the file name from the given css background-image property (trim extension to have the sole name).
getinfo.sprites: Analyze the current page's CSS and returns the spritesInfo object.
